p: The enrichment of the HCP5 and CCR2 favorable genotypes in EC-LTNP with undetectable VL was somehow expected. However, it is very noticeable that the LTNP-C controllers, whose VL are always maintained below 2,000 copies/mL, are also very significantly endowed with these protective genotypes (p-values in Table 3). This suggests that viral replication limited to this threshold value for many years may also be a marker of a profound and stable LTNP status.
